name: Sarah's Fresh Start in the Magical Kingdom
name_original: Sarah's Fresh Start in the Magical Kingdom
description:
A girl seeks to start a new life in a magical kingdom. But all is not what it seems.

All backgrounds and characters were made by me

All the music is from the public domain and came from: https://freepd.com

Story by me. (Matt Neputin)

I've made it for the tyranobuilder game jam.
